creator: steve.downey@netfolio.com
text:
jasper.sh launches java as 'java' instead of '$JAVA_HOME/bin/java', so 
$JAVA_HOME/bin must be on the PATH.

This bug has already been fixed in the scripts in the HEAD branch. At this time, 
however, they are not integrated into the 4.0.2 release.

creator: patrick.luby@planamesa.com
text:
The ClassNotFound exception was due to the fact that the jar files in common/lib 
were not in the CLASSPATH. I have updated the jasper.* scripts in both the HEAD 
branch and tomcat_40_branch to put these files in the CLASSPATH.

Please reopen if you find any more problems with these scripts.
